abstract: BlueMountain Capital Management announces it has hired Jeremy C Stein, former member of of Federal Reserve board, as consultant to advise managers on issues like implications of Fed monetary policy.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy C. Stein is headed to Wall Street to work as a consultant at BlueMountain Capital Management.

headline.main: Former Fed Board Member to Advise Hedge Fund
headline.print_headline: A Former Fed Board Member Heads to a Wall St. Job

snippet: Jeremy C. Stein is headed to Wall Street to work as a consultant at BlueMountain Capital Management.
